---

```{r}
# Create data
data = data.frame(
  x=seq(1:100) + 0.1*seq(1:100)*sample(c(1:10) , 100 , replace=T),
  y=seq(1:100) + 0.2*seq(1:100)*sample(c(1:10) , 100 , replace=T)
)

# Basic scatterplot
plot(x=data$x, y=data$y)
```
